analyzed: ldog pa'i blo ni dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The cognition of non-concomitance is the concept of non-existence.

original: 'di skad du mngon sum ni mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po rang gi ngo bo tsam mthun par byed cing skye la /
analyzed: 'di skad du mngon sum ni mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po rang gi ngo bo tsam mthun par byed cing skye la /
translated: In this way, perception arises in conformity with the mere nature of the thing that is present before it.

original: dngos po de ni dngos su na yod pa'i ngo bos sngon po'i ngo bo gcig pu dang / de las gzhan pa'i dngos po mtha' dag las log pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: dngos po de ni dngos su na yod pa'i ngo bos sngon po'i ngo bo gcig pu dang / de las gzhan pa'i dngos po mtha' dag las log pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: That thing is, in reality, of the nature of existence, of the nature of a single entity, blue, and of the nature that is the opposite of all other entities.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po yod pa'i ngo bos sngon po de de'i rnam par skyes pa'i mngon sum gyis bzung ba de'i phyir 'dir mngon sum gyi stobs kyis gang gis na 'di ni sngon po yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur shes bar 'gyur ba yod pa'i
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po yod pa'i ngo bos sngon po de de'i rnam par skyes pa'i mngon sum gyis bzung ba de'i phyir 'dir mngon sum gyi stobs kyis gang gis na 'di ni sngon po yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur shes bar 'gyur ba yod pa'i
translated: Because the thing, blue, is apprehended by perception that arises in the aspect of that, blue, by virtue of the nature of the existence of the thing, therefore, by the power of perception, it is known in this way, ‚ÄúThis is blue,‚Äù by virtue of which the concept of existence occurs.

original: rnam par rtog ba sngon po lta bur snang ba 'byung ngo ;
analyzed: rnam par rtog ba sngon po lta bur snang ba 'byung ngo ;
translated: The appearance of a concept such as ‚Äúblue‚Äù arises.

original: / gang gi phyir dngos po gzhan mtha' dag dang / mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i sngon po de mngon sum gyis bzung ba de'i phyir mngon sum gyis stobs kho na ser po la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba ser po la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dgag pa'i shes
analyzed: / gang gi phyir dngos po gzhan mtha' dag dang / mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i sngon po de mngon sum gyis bzung ba de'i phyir mngon sum gyis stobs kho na ser po la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba ser po la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dgag pa'i shes
translated: Since the blue, which is of a different nature from all other things, is apprehended by direct perception, therefore, by the power of direct perception alone, one understands that it is not yellow and so on.

original: pa gnyis pa skye'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: pa gnyis pa skye'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, a second cognition arises that excludes yellow and so on.

original: gal te mngon sum dngos po de lta bu'i rnam par skyes par ma gyur na dus phyis rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu dag skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dngos po de lta bu'i rnam par skyes par ma gyur na dus phyis rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu dag skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If direct perception did not arise in such a way, then later on, such concepts would not arise.

original: de lta bas na mngon sum gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtog pa de lta bu gnyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na mngon sum gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtog pa de lta bu gnyis 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, by the power of direct perception, two such concepts arise.

original: gang gi tshe mngon sum rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu dag skyed par byed pa de'i tshe 'bras bu dang bcas par rnam par gzhag gi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mngon sum rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu dag skyed par byed pa de'i tshe 'bras bu dang bcas par rnam par gzhag gi /
translated: When direct perception produces such conceptual thoughts, then it is posited as having a result.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: But not otherwise.

original: de ltar na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because it is only the cause of the cognition of concomitance and reverse concomitance, it has a result.

original: tshad ma gcig 'jug pa ni dngos po thams cad phung po gnyis su rnam par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: tshad ma gcig 'jug pa ni dngos po thams cad phung po gnyis su rnam par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: Therefore, it is established that when one valid cognition operates, all things are divided into two groups.

original: yang ci'i phyir phung po gsum pa mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir phung po gsum pa mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why then is a third group not accepted?

original: de la ma gtogs pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la ma gtogs pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response, it is said that ‚Äúall that is not included in those two‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi tshe dngo po yongs su snang ba lam gtogs pa mtha' dag dgag pa'i ngo bo rnam par bcad pas khyab ba sgrub @164b par byed pa'i tshe kho na rnam pa gzhan med par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngo po yongs su snang ba lam gtogs pa mtha' dag dgag pa'i ngo bo rnam par bcad pas khyab ba sgrub @164b par byed pa'i tshe kho na rnam pa gzhan med par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: When the entity is fully illuminated, all that is not included in those two is necessarily excluded by the nature of negation. At that time, it is established that there is no other aspect.

original: 'di skad du gang gi tshe dngos so snang ba la ma gtogs pa'i dngos po thams cad snang ba ma yin pa nyid du rnam par 'jog par byed pa de'i tshe phung po gsum pa gal srid de /
analyzed: 'di skad du gang gi tshe dngos so snang ba la ma gtogs pa'i dngos po thams cad snang ba ma yin pa nyid du rnam par 'jog par byed pa de'i tshe phung po gsum pa gal srid de /
translated: This is what he says: ‚ÄúWhen you posit that all things that are not included in the appearance of individual things are not actually appearing, at that time, there is no third alternative.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa kho nas ser po la sogs pa ma lus pa brtsal bas yul du byed pa na phung po gzhan med par ston par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa kho nas ser po la sogs pa ma lus pa brtsal bas yul du byed pa na phung po gzhan med par ston par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, he explains that when you search for all yellow things, etc., by means of the conceptual thought of negation, and you take them as objects, you show that there is no other alternative.

original: yang ci'i phyir dngos po yongs su snang ba la ma gtogs pa ma lus pa rnam par bcad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyab pa sgrub bar byed ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir dngos po yongs su snang ba la ma gtogs pa ma lus pa rnam par bcad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyab pa sgrub bar byed ce na /
translated: Why do you prove that the nature of the complete negation of all things that are not included in the appearance of things is pervasion?

original: de'i phyir / de de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is not pervaded by being different from it,‚Äù etc.

original: gal te yongs su snang ba la ma gtogs pa'i don te snang ba las gzhan pa nyid kyis khyab par ma gyur na /
analyzed: gal te yongs su snang ba la ma gtogs pa'i don te snang ba las gzhan pa nyid kyis khyab par ma gyur na /
translated: If the meaning that is not included in the appearance is not pervaded by being different from the appearance,

original: de'i tshe 'gog par byed pa'i shes pa des /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'gog par byed pa'i shes pa des /
translated: At that time, the consciousness that is the agent of cessationüîΩ

original: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab pa'i don gang yin pa de rnam par bcad pa dang logs shig tu byas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab pa'i don gang yin pa de rnam par bcad pa dang logs shig tu byas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the object that is not pervaded by that which is other than the consciousness that is the negating factor would not be eliminated and set aside.

original: de'i phyir yang yongs su snang ba nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po yongs su bcad par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang yongs su snang ba nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po yongs su bcad par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it follows that the thing that is accepted as the appearing object is eliminated,

original: de dang de ma yin pa'i ngo bo dag rnam par ma phye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dang de ma yin pa'i ngo bo dag rnam par ma phye ba'i phyir /
translated: because the nature of that and that which is not that are not distinguished.

original: 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag med do zhes bya ba thal ba snga mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag med do zhes bya ba thal ba snga mar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that there is neither engagement nor withdrawal, as stated previously.

original: de zhes bya ba ni snang ba la ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni snang ba la ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to what is not included in the appearance.

original: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba ni snang ba las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba ni snang ba las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab na zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
translated: ‚Äú If it is not pervaded by that which is other than that‚Äù means if it is not pervaded by that which is other than the appearance.

original: des zhes bya ba ni 'gog par byed pa'i shes bas so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni 'gog par byed pa'i shes bas so //
translated: ‚Äú By that‚Äù refers to the consciousness that is the negating factor.

original: don de rnam par ma bcad pa'i phyir zhes ba ba de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab pa'i don ni don de'o //
analyzed: don de rnam par ma bcad pa'i phyir zhes ba ba de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab pa'i don ni don de'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause of not eliminating that object‚Äù is that the meaning of ‚Äúnot being pervaded by being different from that‚Äù is that object.

original: de rnam par ma bcad pa ni don de rnam par ma bcad ba'o //
analyzed: de rnam par ma bcad pa ni don de rnam par ma bcad ba'o //
translated: Not eliminating that is not eliminating that object.

original: 'jug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to include the engagement, he says,

original: de lta bas na tshad ma'i byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na tshad ma'i byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, the activity of valid knowledge is...

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas tshad ma 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma gcig kho na'i byed pa ni dngos po 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa yongs su snang ba nyid
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas tshad ma 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma gcig kho na'i byed pa ni dngos po 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa yongs su snang ba nyid
translated: Because it is just the cause of the cognition of positive and negative concomitance that makes valid knowledge have a result, therefore, the activity of only one valid knowledge is the appearance of the engagement of valid knowledge in some object.

original: du 'dod pa de ni yongs su gcod cing /
analyzed: du 'dod pa de ni yongs su gcod cing /
translated: That is asserted to be the elimination of that.

original: de las gzhan pa yongs su mi snang ba nyid du 'dod pa ni rnam par gcod pa 'gog par byed la /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa yongs su mi snang ba nyid du 'dod pa ni rnam par gcod pa 'gog par byed la /
translated: The non-appearance of anything other than that is asserted to be the elimination of the negation of that.

original: snang ba dang mi snang ba dang / mi snang ba la ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum gzhan ni med par ston to zhes bya ba 'di tsam du zad mod /üîΩre zhig tshad ma gcig @165a * //üîΩ'jug pa de ni yongs su gcod la /
analyzed: snang ba dang mi snang ba dang / mi snang ba la ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum gzhan ni med par ston to zhes bya ba 'di tsam du zad mod / re zhig tshad ma gcig @165a * // 'jug pa de ni yongs su gcod la /
translated: It is merely shown that there is no third possibility apart from being an object of perception and not being an object of perception.

original: de las gzhan pa ni rnam par gcod do zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni rnam par gcod do zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
translated: If it is reasonable to say that when one valid cognition engages its object, it determines that object and excludes it from being other than that,

original: rnam pa gzhan gsum po med par go ji ltar ston par byed ce na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gsum po med par go ji ltar ston par byed ce na /
translated: how does it show that there is no third possibility?

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To respond, he says, ‚ÄúWhen a valid cognition engages its object,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ltar sngon po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa'i sngon po de nyid de las gzhan pa'i ser po la sogs pa las rnam par gcod pa logs shig tu byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa'i sngon po de nyid de las gzhan pa'i ser po la sogs pa las rnam par gcod pa logs shig tu byed do //
translated: When a valid cognition engages some object, such as blue, that very blue is excluded from being other than that, such as yellow, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir kho nar der sngon po de nyid yongs su bcad pa dang / de las gzhan pa ser po la sogs pa sngon po de las rnam par gcod pa dang gang gi phyir sngon po de la de las gzhan pa ser po la sogs pa yongs su gcod par ma gyur pa de kho na'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho nar der sngon po de nyid yongs su bcad pa dang / de las gzhan pa ser po la sogs pa sngon po de las rnam par gcod pa dang gang gi phyir sngon po de la de las gzhan pa ser po la sogs pa yongs su gcod par ma gyur pa de kho na'i phyir /
translated: Because blue is exclusively determined there, and yellow and so on, which are other than that, are excluded from blue, and because blue is not determined as other than that, yellow and so on.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i tshad ma de nyid rnam pa gzhan med par sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i tshad ma de nyid rnam pa gzhan med par sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the valid knowledge that was explained establishes that there is no other aspect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de snang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de snang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúWhen it appears,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir snang ba sngon po gang yin pa de snang na ser po la sogs pa gang zhig ma mthong ba'i ma mthong bas thams cad de ni las gzhan pa nyid du mthong ba las gzhan pa nyid du rna par 'jog pa dang / gang gi phyir snang ba las gzhan pa ma yin no snang ba las gzhan pa ma yin pa ni snang ba nyid kho na rnam par 'jog pa de'i phyir rna pa gzhan med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir snang ba sngon po gang yin pa de snang na ser po la sogs pa gang zhig ma mthong ba'i ma mthong bas thams cad de ni las gzhan pa nyid du mthong ba las gzhan pa nyid du rna par 'jog pa dang / gang gi phyir snang ba las gzhan pa ma yin no snang ba las gzhan pa ma yin pa ni snang ba nyid kho na rnam par 'jog pa de'i phyir rna pa gzhan med pa yin no //
translated: Because when blue appears, yellow, etc. are not seen, and because non-seeing is posited as different from seeing, and because that which is not different from appearance is posited as appearance itself, therefore there is no difference.

original: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: As for ‚Äúnot being different from that,‚Äù

original: de las gzhan pa ni de las gzhan pa ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni de las gzhan pa ste /
translated: ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to that which is different from it,

original: snang ba las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snang ba las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which is to say, different from appearance.

original: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa ni de las gzhan pa ma yin pa ste /üîΩsnang ba de nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa ni de las gzhan pa ma yin pa ste / snang ba de nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúNot being different from that‚Äù means not being different from that,üîΩwhich is to say, that very appearance.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni snang ba nyid du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni snang ba nyid du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that very way‚Äù means in the way of appearance.

original: gang dag snang ba dang de las gzhan pa nyid du zhes 'don pa de dag gi ltar na ni gzhung rung bar dga' ste /
analyzed: gang dag snang ba dang de las gzhan pa nyid du zhes 'don pa de dag gi ltar na ni gzhung rung bar dga' ste /
translated: Those who read the text as ‚Äúbecause they are seen and not seen‚Äù like it because it is correct.

original: 'di ltar gal te mthong ba nyid dang / de las gzhan pa nyid du thams cad rnam par 'jog par bshad na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te mthong ba nyid dang / de las gzhan pa nyid du thams cad rnam par 'jog par bshad na /
translated: If it is explained that everything is posited as seen and not seen,

original: de'i tshe de las gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba lhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de las gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba lhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be redundant to say ‚Äúbecause they are posited as not seen and seen.‚Äù

original: de lta bas na gzhung 'di ni mi snang ba thams cad ni de las gzhan pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir la zhes de skad du gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na gzhung 'di ni mi snang ba thams cad ni de las gzhan pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir la zhes de skad du gdon par bya'o //
translated: Thus this text should be read as ‚Äúbecause all that is not seen is posited as other than that.‚Äù

original: 'di skad du dmigs pa na 'di nyid du rnam par 'jog la mi dmigs pa thams cad ni gzhan nyid du rnam par 'jog ste /
analyzed: 'di skad du dmigs pa na 'di nyid du rnam par 'jog la mi dmigs pa thams cad ni gzhan nyid du rnam par 'jog ste /
translated: This is saying that when it is observed, it is posited as this, and all that is not observed is posited as other.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan med par grub po zhes bya bar @165b gnas so zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan med par grub po zhes bya bar @165b gnas so zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is established that it has no other aspect.

original: phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gang dag yin pa de la yang rnam pa gzhan dgag pa bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gang dag yin pa de la yang rnam pa gzhan dgag pa bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to refute other aspects,

original: 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩmthong ba dang ma mthong ba la ma gtogs pa rnam pa gzhan med par ston par byed pa'i gzhung 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rnam par bshad par
analyzed: 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la ma gtogs pa rnam pa gzhan med par ston par byed pa'i gzhung 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rnam par bshad par
translated: this text says, ‚Äúorder, disorder, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThis text shows that there is no other aspect apart from seeing and not seeing.üîΩBy this, one should understand that order, disorder, etc.,

original: blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: blta bar bya ste /
translated: are also explained as mutually exclusive, other than that.

original: de la yang rim dang rim ma yin pa ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum pa med do snyam du dgongs pa yin no //üîΩcig car ma la gtogs pa'i dus ji snyed pa de thams cad ni rim zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang rim dang rim ma yin pa ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum pa med do snyam du dgongs pa yin no // cig car ma la gtogs pa'i dus ji snyed pa de thams cad ni rim zhes bya'o //
translated: And in that, one should think that apart from order and disorder, there is no third alternative.üîΩAll that time included in order is called ‚Äúorder.‚Äù

original: rim la ma gtogs pa'i dus ji snyed pa de thams cad ni cig car bya'o //
analyzed: rim la ma gtogs pa'i dus ji snyed pa de thams cad ni cig car bya'o //
translated: All that time not included in order is called ‚Äúdisorder.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum pa lta ga la srid /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum pa lta ga la srid /
translated: Therefore, how could a third possibility be possible?

original: 'dir 'bras bu dus gcig tu skyed pa'i rgu ni cig car zhes tha snyad gdags so //
analyzed: 'dir 'bras bu dus gcig tu skyed pa'i rgu ni cig car zhes tha snyad gdags so //
translated: Here, the cause that produces the effect at the same time is called ‚Äúsimultaneous.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu brgyu de bskyed pa'i rgyu ni rim zhes tha snyad gdags so //
analyzed: 'bras bu brgyu de bskyed pa'i rgyu ni rim zhes tha snyad gdags so //
translated: The cause that produces the effect in succession is called ‚Äúsequential.‚Äù

original: gang dag la phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo yin pa de dag ni phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo can dag ste /
analyzed: gang dag la phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo yin pa de dag ni phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo can dag ste /
translated: Those that have the nature of mutual exclusion are those that have the nature of mutual exclusion.

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that they have the nature of abiding in mutual exclusion.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa med pa la sogs pa blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa med pa la sogs pa blta bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù should be applied to permanent and impermanent, conditioned and unconditioned, obstructed and unobstructed, and so on.

original: zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Having completed the digression,

original: dkyus ma sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dkyus ma sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to apply the main point,

original: de lta bas na de ltar gcig dmigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na de ltar gcig dmigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúTherefore, in this way, when one is observed,‚Äù and so on.

original: de lta bas na de skad bshad pa'i rnam pas sngon po la sogs pa gcig dmigs pas don 'di sngon po yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na de skad bshad pa'i rnam pas sngon po la sogs pa gcig dmigs pas don 'di sngon po yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, in the way that has been explained, since one observes blue, etc.,üîΩthis object is blue, but it is not the entity of yellow, etc.

original: ser po la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de lta bu sngon po de'i ser po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ser po la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de lta bu sngon po de'i ser po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
translated: In that way, that blue excludes the entity of yellow, etc.,

original: de'i yul lam de'i dus su sngon po la ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad 'gog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul lam de'i dus su sngon po la ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad 'gog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it does not exclude everything else that is not blue at that time or in that place.

original: 'di ni shes pa gcig dang 'brel pa dang phan tshun ltos pa kho nas gzhan nyid yin par 'dod pas na /
analyzed: 'di ni shes pa gcig dang 'brel pa dang phan tshun ltos pa kho nas gzhan nyid yin par 'dod pas na /
translated: Since it is asserted that difference is only the relation of one thing to another,

original: 'dir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba rung ba nyid kyi ngo bor mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba rung ba nyid kyi ngo bor mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: in this case, the object of observation is suitable as the entity that is similar.

original: phyogs gnas yin par 'gyur pa 'di tsam zhig tu zad kyi /üîΩphyogs der dmigs pa'i @166a * //
analyzed: phyogs gnas yin par 'gyur pa 'di tsam zhig tu zad kyi / phyogs der dmigs pa'i @166a * //
translated: Therefore, it is only the case that it is the locus of the position.

original: rig byar ma gyur pa yang 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rig byar ma gyur pa yang 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The object of observation of that position is not the exclusion of that which is not blue.

original: dmigs pa de'i yul dang dus kyang gang dag yin pa de dag ni //
analyzed: dmigs pa de'i yul dang dus kyang gang dag yin pa de dag ni //
translated: The object and time of that cognition are also just that.

original: de'i yul dang dus kyi sgra bshad do //
analyzed: de'i yul dang dus kyi sgra bshad do //
translated: This is the explanation of the object and time of that cognition.

original: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to conclude, he says,

original: de lta bas na de'i bdag nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na de'i bdag nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it would not be of the nature of that, etc.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad med par 'gog par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad med par 'gog par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not the case that everything is being refuted,

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa sngon po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa sngon po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
translated: it would not be of the nature of that, i.e., it would not be of the nature of blue.

original: de'i yul dang dang dus su nye bar yang 'gyur bas 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i yul dang dang dus su nye bar yang 'gyur bas 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: And it would be in the object and time of that, i.e., blue. There is no contradiction at all.üîΩHere he gives an example:

original: 'dir dpe / ro dang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dir dpe / ro dang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Like taste, form, etc.

original: ji ltar gzugs ni ro'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs ni ro'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi /
translated: Just as form is not of the nature of taste,

original: 'on kyang ro'i yul dang ro skye ba'i dus na yod pa ltar 'dir yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on kyang ro'i yul dang ro skye ba'i dus na yod pa ltar 'dir yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur /
translated: nevertheless, it exists in the object of taste and at the time of the arising of taste. Here it is the same.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis na dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dgag pa kho na bya bar nus kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis na dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dgag pa kho na bya bar nus kyi /
translated: Because, in the manner explained, it is only the negation of the nature of the object that can be accomplished.

original: de'i yul dang dus dag tu thams cad med par dgag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes khyad par du dgos so //
analyzed: de'i yul dang dus dag tu thams cad med par dgag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes khyad par du dgos so //
translated: But not the negation of all things in that place and time, therefore, the qualification ‚Äúthat has become the object of the mind‚Äù is necessary.

original: dkyus ma'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dkyus ma'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to summarize the main point, he says,

original: de lta bas na ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, only from the non-apprehension explained, etc.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par med par gzhan thams cad dgag par bya mi nus pa de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las dus res 'ga' yul la la zhig tu dngos po 'ga' zhig med par 'grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par med par gzhan thams cad dgag par bya mi nus pa de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las dus res 'ga' yul la la zhig tu dngos po 'ga' zhig med par 'grub pa yin gyi /
translated: Because it is not possible to negate all other things without distinction, therefore, only from the non-apprehension explained, in some place and time, the nonexistence of some thing is established.

original: gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: But not from any other, this is established.

original: de ltar na gong du gzhan yod pa de nyid dang / de'i yul can gyi shes pa de dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ji ste ma yin zhes klan ka btsal ba gang yin pa de la re zhig gzhan yod pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa nyid yin pa bsal zin to //
analyzed: de ltar na gong du gzhan yod pa de nyid dang / de'i yul can gyi shes pa de dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ji ste ma yin zhes klan ka btsal ba gang yin pa de la re zhig gzhan yod pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa nyid yin pa bsal zin to //
translated: First, the existence of something else is not the proof of the nonexistence of a thing.

original: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i rtags nyid yin pa dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i rtags nyid yin pa dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute the reason that the object of the consciousness that has the existence of something else as its object is the nonexistence of a thing,

original: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe object of the consciousness that has the existence of something else as its object is not a reason.‚Äù

original: bum pas dben pa'i sa gzhi'i yul can gyi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bum pa med pa bsgrub par byed pa yin par ni 'dod pa kho na'i 'di rtags nyid du mi 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: bum pas dben pa'i sa gzhi'i yul can gyi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bum pa med pa bsgrub par byed pa yin par ni 'dod pa kho na'i 'di rtags nyid du mi 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: It is asserted that the object of the consciousness that has as its object the place that is empty of a pot is the proof of the nonexistence of a pot. It is only not asserted to be a reason.

original: ci'i phyir 'di rtags nyid du mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di rtags nyid du mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why is it not asserted to be a reason?

original: der @166b yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu grub par bya ba nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: der @166b yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu grub par bya ba nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Moreover, if you accept that the non-existence of an entity is something to be established separately, then‚Ä¶

original: rtags nyid du brtag par bya ba gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa der yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par khas len na 'brel pa med pa de'i so na 'dug pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtags nyid du brtag par bya ba gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa der yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par khas len na 'brel pa med pa de'i so na 'dug pa nyid do //
translated: If you accept that the object of apprehension, which has as its domain the existence of something else, is itself a sign, then the non-existence of an entity is something to be established separately.

original: bum pa med pa dang gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs par lhan cig don gcig la 'du ba'am /üîΩrten dang brten pa'i dngos po'am /
analyzed: bum pa med pa dang gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs par lhan cig don gcig la 'du ba'am / rten dang brten pa'i dngos po'am /
translated: The non-existence of a pot and the existence of something else do not have the same object of apprehension, nor are they co-present in the same object.üîΩThey are not in a relationship of supported and supporter,

original: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: nor are they in a relationship of that which is produced and that which produces.

original: so sor ma grub pa'i nyes pa 'dir yang bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor ma grub pa'i nyes pa 'dir yang bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that this error of non-establishment is also applicable to you,

original: rtags 'byung ba'i dus kho na na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rtags 'byung ba'i dus kho na na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIf you say that the sign occurs at the time of the arising of the effect,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtags 'byung ba'i dus ni skye ba'i dus te /
analyzed: rtags 'byung ba'i dus ni skye ba'i dus te /
translated: The time of the occurrence of the sign is the time of the arising of the effect.

original: sngar bum pas dben pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan yod pa rtogs nas phyis bum pa med pas phyogs rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rab tu bsgrub pa nye bar bstan te /
analyzed: sngar bum pas dben pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan yod pa rtogs nas phyis bum pa med pas phyogs rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rab tu bsgrub pa nye bar bstan te /
translated: The forward and reverse pervasion are taught.

original: de'i 'og tu phyogs rtogs pas bum pa med pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phyogs rtogs pas bum pa med pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: After that, the understanding of the nonexistence of a pot is not by the understanding of the place.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: de las gzhan pa bum pas dben pa'i phyogs rtogs pa kho na de med pa bum pa med pa rtogs kyi phyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa bum pas dben pa'i phyogs rtogs pa kho na de med pa bum pa med pa rtogs kyi phyis ni ma yin no //
translated: The understanding of the nonexistence of a pot, the nonexistence of that which is different from it, is the understanding of the place devoid of a pot, not later.

original: ci'i phyir rtags nyid du mi 'dod /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtags nyid du mi 'dod /
translated: Why is it not accepted as the evidence?

original: de las gzhan pa rtogs pa'i dus kho na de med par rtogs zhes de'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rtogs pa'i dus kho na de med par rtogs zhes de'i phyir /
translated: Because the understanding of the nonexistence of that which is different from it is the understanding of its nonexistence.

original: mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúImmediately upon seeing,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi mjug thogs kho nar chod pa shol ba med par phyogs kyi ngo bo 'di ni yod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi mjug thogs kho nar chod pa shol ba med par phyogs kyi ngo bo 'di ni yod do //
translated: Because immediately after direct perception, without any interruption, the nature of the place is understood: ‚ÄúThis exists.‚Äù

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo 'di ni med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa skye ba /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo 'di ni med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa skye ba /
translated: The ascertainment ‚ÄúThe entity of the pot, etc. does not exist‚Äù arises.

original: de'i phyir de med pa dang / gzhan yod pa dag ni dus mnyam du rtogs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de med pa dang / gzhan yod pa dag ni dus mnyam du rtogs te /
translated: Therefore, the non-existence of that and the existence of something else are realized simultaneously.

original: ji ltar bum pas dben pa'i phyogs la don du gnyer bas /
analyzed: ji ltar bum pas dben pa'i phyogs la don du gnyer bas /
translated: Just as a person who is seeking a pot

original: phyogs mthong nas mthong ma thag tu phyogs 'di ni yod pa yin zhes nges par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: phyogs mthong nas mthong ma thag tu phyogs 'di ni yod pa yin zhes nges par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: sees the place and immediately ascertains that the place exists,

original: de nyid kyis rung ba nyid kyi ngo bor mtshungs pa'i bum pa ma mthong nas 'di na bum pa med do zhes bya bar nges par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis rung ba nyid kyi ngo bor mtshungs pa'i bum pa ma mthong nas 'di na bum pa med do zhes bya bar nges par byed do //
translated: in the same way, by not seeing a pot that is similar to it in being suitable, he ascertains that the pot does not exist there.

original: chod pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir khyab pa gang gi phyir rtags skye ba'i dus de kho na bum pa med par grub pa de'i phyir 'di gnyis so sor rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chod pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir khyab pa gang gi phyir rtags skye ba'i dus de kho na bum pa med par grub pa de'i phyir 'di gnyis so sor rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúobstructed‚Äù here means that because the place is pervaded by either the presence or absence of a pot, at the very time the sign arises, the pot is established as either present or absent. Therefore, these two are not separate in terms of the sign and the possession of the sign.

original: rtags 'byung ba'i dus kho na med par 'grub po zhes bya ba 'di dag las she na /
analyzed: rtags 'byung ba'i dus kho na med par 'grub po zhes bya ba 'di dag las she na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhy is it established as either present or absent at the very time the sign arises?‚Äù

original: gzhan yod pa rtogs nas gdod ces bya ba la sogs @167a * //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa rtogs nas gdod ces bya ba la sogs @167a * //
translated: Having realized the existence of the other, one says at that time and so on.

original: pa smos te /
analyzed: pa smos te /
translated: Having realized the existence of another, one says at that time and so on.

original: dran pa brjod par bzhed pa yin te /
analyzed: dran pa brjod par bzhed pa yin te /
translated: He intends to say that it is memory.

original: des na mthong ba dang rtogs pa dang chod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: des na mthong ba dang rtogs pa dang chod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Therefore, it means without obstruction of seeing, realization, and understanding.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The reason is stated: because the example of another is not established.

original: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pas bum pa med par bsgrub par bya ba la dpe 'ga' yang med do //üîΩde nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pas bum pa med par bsgrub par bya ba la dpe 'ga' yang med do // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: There is no example at all for proving the nonexistence of a pot by the observation of the subject, which is the existence of another.

original: de ni gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says, That which is the pervasion of which . . . and so on.

original: rtags nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po de ni rtags nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po gang zhig dngos po gang gi rjes su 'gro ba yod pa dngos po de'i rtags yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtags nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po de ni rtags nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po gang zhig dngos po gang gi rjes su 'gro ba yod pa dngos po de'i rtags yin pa'o //
translated: That which is the property to be established, the existence of which is the property to be established, is the pervasion of which property?

original: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med ce na /
translated: Why is there no pervasion?

original: de'i phyir / 'di skad du gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'di skad du gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIn what place, etc.‚ÄùüîΩüîΩ

original: 'di ltar 'di skad du gang na yongs su snang ba'i phyogs kyi yul can gyi dmigs pa yod pa de na bum pa med do zhes bya bar bstan par ni mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di skad du gang na yongs su snang ba'i phyogs kyi yul can gyi dmigs pa yod pa de na bum pa med do zhes bya bar bstan par ni mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúIn this way, it is not possible to demonstrate that where the object exists, the pot does not exist.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir mi nus she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi nus she na /
translated: Why is it not possible?

original: dmigs pa gcig pu de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dmigs pa gcig pu de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause that single object of observation does not exist in that place.‚Äù

original: yongs su snang ba'i yul can gyi dmigs pa gcig po gang yin pa de bzhin gang na yod pa gang gis na gang dang gang na 'di yod pa de dang de na bum pa med do zhes rjes su 'gro ba byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: yongs su snang ba'i yul can gyi dmigs pa gcig po gang yin pa de bzhin gang na yod pa gang gis na gang dang gang na 'di yod pa de dang de na bum pa med do zhes rjes su 'gro ba byed par 'gyur /
translated: That single object of observation which is the object of the appearance does not exist in that place, by which it would be the case that where that exists, the pot does not exist.

original: de la 'di snyam du khyad par yongs su bor nas spyir rjes su 'gro ba byed do zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du khyad par yongs su bor nas spyir rjes su 'gro ba byed do zhe na /
translated: If you think that, having abandoned the particular, one should follow the general,

original: spyir rab tu bstan pa'i dpe la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: spyir rab tu bstan pa'i dpe la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIn the example of the general demonstration as well,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi tshe gang dang gang na bum pas dben pa'i phyogs tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa yod pa de dang de na bum pa med do zhes spyir khyab pa ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe yang /üîΩdpe la tshad ma gzhan med pa bum pas dben pa'i phyogs tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bum pa med pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin par 'dod par bya dgos la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gang dang gang na bum pas dben pa'i phyogs tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa yod pa de dang de na bum pa med do zhes spyir khyab pa ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe yang / dpe la tshad ma gzhan med pa bum pas dben pa'i phyogs tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bum pa med pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin par 'dod par bya dgos la /
translated: When you wish to teach the general pervasion that wherever there is an objective referent that apprehends a mere location devoid of a pot, a pot does not exist there,üîΩthen you must assert that the very objective referent that apprehends a mere location devoid of a pot is the proof of the probandum, the absence of a pot, and that there is no other valid knowledge.

original: de la yang tshad ma gzhan med par mi dmigs pa 'di kho na sgrub par yin par brjod dgos la /
analyzed: de la yang tshad ma gzhan med par mi dmigs pa 'di kho na sgrub par yin par brjod dgos la /
translated: And in that case, you must say that it is this very nonapprehension that proves the absence of a pot and that there is no other valid knowledge.

original: sgrub pa de la yang dpe gzhan zhig brjod dgos pa thug pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa de la yang dpe gzhan zhig brjod dgos pa thug pa med pa yin no //
translated: And in that proof, you must state another example, and so on, ad infinitum.

original: thug pa med pa yin na ni dang po ste /
analyzed: thug pa med pa yin na ni dang po ste /
translated: If there is an infinite regress, then the first,

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa bum pa med pa rtogs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa bum pa med pa rtogs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: the pot‚Äôs absence, which is asserted to be the probandum, would not be understood.

original: dkyus ma'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dkyus ma'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to conclude the main point, he says,üîΩ‚ÄúIf you say that the absence of a pot is understood, then what is the point of the example?‚Äù

original: de lta bas na rtags gang las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na rtags gang las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúTherefore, non-establishment by any reason‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i rnam pas na gzhan yod pa dang / de'i yul @167b can gyi dmigs pa'i dngos po med pa sgrub pa rtags nyid du mi 'thad pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i rnam pas na gzhan yod pa dang / de'i yul @167b can gyi dmigs pa'i dngos po med pa sgrub pa rtags nyid du mi 'thad pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because of the explanation in that way, the existence of another and the non-establishment of the object of the domain of that are not tenable as reasons. Therefore,

original: rtags gang las kyang dngos po med par mi 'grub par khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtags gang las kyang dngos po med par mi 'grub par khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: it should be accepted that non-establishment by any reason does not establish non-existence.

original: gal te rtags gang las kyang dngos po med pa mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rtags gang las kyang dngos po med pa mi 'gyur na /
translated: If non-existence is not established by any reason,

original: 'o ma de ma grub na /
analyzed: 'o ma de ma grub na /
translated: then if milk is not established,

original: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa yang ji ltar 'jug pa 'grub ce na /
analyzed: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa yang ji ltar 'jug pa 'grub ce na /
translated: how is the designation of non-existence also established?

original: de'i phyir / mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúBy the non-observation that is the definition of direct perception‚Ä¶‚ÄùüîΩThe existence of another that is the definition of the domain

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan yod pa gang yin pa de mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa /
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan yod pa gang yin pa de mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa /
translated: is the non-observation that is the definition of direct perception.

original: phyogs dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis grub na dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis grub na dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: If the non-existent were established by the nature of the object, then the designation of the non-existent would be established.

original: dngos po med pa ni phyogs rtogs pa'i dus kho na grub pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni phyogs rtogs pa'i dus kho na grub pa yin te /
translated: The non-existent is established just at the time of the understanding of the object.

original: 'di lta bur bum pas dben pa'i phyogs rtogs pa de kho na'i tshe bum pa med pa yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lta bur bum pas dben pa'i phyogs rtogs pa de kho na'i tshe bum pa med pa yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, just at the time of the understanding of the object devoid of a pot, the non-existence of the pot is also understood.

original: gal te bum pa med pa grub na /
analyzed: gal te bum pa med pa grub na /
translated: If the non-existence of the pot is established,

original: 'o na ni dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa yang grub pa kho na yin pas /
analyzed: 'o na ni dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa yang grub pa kho na yin pas /
translated: then the designation of the non-existent is also established.

original: su zhig dngos po med pa rtogs nas de la dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig dngos po med pa rtogs nas de la dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: So, who, having understood the non-existent, would not engage in the designation of the non-existent?

original: de'i phyir / rtogs pa rmongs pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / rtogs pa rmongs pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: ‚ÄúThe understanding of the ignorant‚Äù and so on.

original: dngos po med pa rtogs kyang dngos po med par tha snyad gdags par mi byed pa'i blo gros rmongs pa lung ngan pas bslus pa'i rtogs par byed pa de lta bu dag yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa rtogs kyang dngos po med par tha snyad gdags par mi byed pa'i blo gros rmongs pa lung ngan pas bslus pa'i rtogs par byed pa de lta bu dag yod do //
translated: But there are some who, although they understand that there is no entity, are confused about the understanding that there is no non-entity, and they are deceived by bad philosophy.

original: 'di ltar sor mo'i rtse mo glang po che brgyas dben par grub kyang grangs can pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la 'chel ba la la sor mo'i rtse mo la glang po che brgya med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sor mo'i rtse mo glang po che brgyas dben par grub kyang grangs can pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la 'chel ba la la sor mo'i rtse mo la glang po che brgya med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi byed do //
translated: Thus, although the tip of the finger is established as devoid of a hundred elephants, some who are attached to the philosophy of the Sankhyas do not apply the convention ‚Äúthe tip of the finger is devoid of a hundred elephants.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du ba lang gi gong bu rigs la sogs pas dben par grub kyang bye brag pa rnams rigs la sogs pa med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ba lang gi gong bu rigs la sogs pas dben par grub kyang bye brag pa rnams rigs la sogs pa med par tha snyad gdags pa 'jug par mi byed do //
translated: Similarly, although the aggregate of a cow is established as devoid of a class and so on, the Vaisesikas do not apply the convention ‚Äúthe class and so on do not exist.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten na yang phyogs la lar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyis ma mthong bzhin du yang gzhan la ci 'di na lha sbyin med dam zhes de skad 'dri ba dag mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten na yang phyogs la lar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyis ma mthong bzhin du yang gzhan la ci 'di na lha sbyin med dam zhes de skad 'dri ba dag mthong ngo //
translated: Likewise, in the world, even though one does not see a certain thing that is desired in a certain place, one still asks another, ‚ÄúIs Devadatta here?‚Äù

original: 'di ni rnam par dpyad na ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par dpyad na ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas /
translated: This is a case of over-extension when analyzed.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: zhar la 'ongs pas chog go //
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pas chog go //
translated: enough of this digression.

original: de ltar mi dmigs pa rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mi dmigs pa rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas bstan nas /
translated: Thus, non-apprehension has been taught from the point of view of its nature.

original: rab tu dbye ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩmi dmigs @168a * //üîΩpa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir / mi dmigs @168a * // pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach its divisions, he says,

original: mi dmigs pa de ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat non-apprehension is to be known as threefold.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gsum po de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just those three kinds, he says,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the existence of cause and effect is established.‚Äù

original: gang zhig dngos po med par sgrub par byed pa dang / gang zhig mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du smos par byed pa de gnyis mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por yang grub /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po med par sgrub par byed pa dang / gang zhig mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du smos par byed pa de gnyis mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por yang grub /
translated: The two, that which is established as a non-thing and that which is stated as a logical reason of non-apprehension, are established as the relation of cause and effect by means of direct perception and inference.

original: bdag nyid kyi tshad mas khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i dngos por yang grub pa yin la rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi tshad mas khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i dngos por yang grub pa yin la rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i sgo nas /
translated: They are also established as the relation of the pervaded and the pervader by means of one‚Äôs own valid knowledge.

original: rgyu dang khyad par byed pa gang zhig dngos po med par grub pa de gnyis kyis mi dmigs pa ni go rims bzhin du /
analyzed: rgyu dang khyad par byed pa gang zhig dngos po med par grub pa de gnyis kyis mi dmigs pa ni go rims bzhin du /
translated: The two, that which is established as a non-thing by means of the non-apprehension of a nature and that which is established as a non-thing by means of the non-apprehension of a cause or a specific property, are, respectively,

original: rgyu mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba gnyis yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba gnyis yin no //
translated: the two called ‚Äúnon-apprehension of a cause‚Äù and ‚Äúnon-apprehension of a specific property.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni gsum pa yin no //
translated: The third is the non-apprehension of a nature.

original: mi dmigs pa rnam pa mang mod kyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa rnam pa mang mod kyi /
translated: Although there are many types of non-apprehension,

original: rtsa ba'i rnam pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rnam pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the fundamental types,

original: rnam pa gsum zhes bshad do //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum zhes bshad do //
translated: it is explained that there are three types.

original: 'di ltar rab tu byed pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa mgo smos pas go ba mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i dbang du byas nas brtsams pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar rab tu byed pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa mgo smos pas go ba mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i dbang du byas nas brtsams pa yin pas /
translated: Thus, this chapter is composed for the sake of those who delight in a brief, concise presentation that can be easily understood by those who are intelligent.

original: des rtsa ba'i rab tu dbye ba de mthong nas rgyas par khong nas 'dren par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des rtsa ba'i rab tu dbye ba de mthong nas rgyas par khong nas 'dren par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having seen this basic division, one should understand the extensive explanation.

original: yang re zhig rgyu dang khyab par byed pa kho na la ji ltar med par tha snyad gdags pa 'grub ce na /üîΩde'i phyir de la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yang re zhig rgyu dang khyab par byed pa kho na la ji ltar med par tha snyad gdags pa 'grub ce na / de'i phyir de la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, how is the ascription of nonexistence to a cause and a pervader established?üîΩTherefore, it says, ‚ÄúThe ascription of nonexistence to a cause and a pervader is also to be seen only in the establishment of the existence of something else.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gis rang gi ngo bo med pa tha snyad gdags pa gang yin pa de yang gzhan yod par grub pa kho na las blta bar bya'i //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gis rang gi ngo bo med pa tha snyad gdags pa gang yin pa de yang gzhan yod par grub pa kho na las blta bar bya'i //
translated: The ascription of nonexistence to a cause and a pervader is to be understood only in the establishment of the existence of something else.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa 'ba' zhig gzhan yod par grub pa las rig par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa 'ba' zhig gzhan yod par grub pa las rig par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not to be understood only in the nonobservation of an essence.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag kyang gzhan yod par grub pa la rigs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang /
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag kyang gzhan yod par grub pa la rigs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang /
translated: Also, the non-observation of a cause and the non-observation of a pervader should be understood as proofs of the existence of something else.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras rig par bya'o //
translated: This is also indicated by the word ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas rgyu'am khyab par byed pa dngos po med par grub tu chug na yang /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas rgyu'am khyab par byed pa dngos po med par grub tu chug na yang /
translated: Even though the non-existence of a cause or a pervader is established in the manner that has been explained,

original: des na ci zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci zhe na /
translated: what then?

original: de'i phyir / de ltar grub pa de ni 'bras bu dang khyab par bya bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de ltar grub pa de ni 'bras bu dang khyab par bya bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, Dharmakƒ´rti‚Äôs Exposition of Valid Knowledge says, ‚ÄúThat which is established in that way is a proof of the non-existence of a result or a pervaded object.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par rgyu dngos po med pa'am khyad par byed pa dngos po med par de grub pa yin pa de'i tshe 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par rgyu dngos po med pa'am khyad par byed pa dngos po med par de grub pa yin pa de'i tshe 'bras bu'am /
translated: When the non-existence of a cause or the non-existence of a pervader in the manner that has been explained is established, then it is a proof of the non-existence of a result or a pervaded object.

original: khyab @168b par bya ba dag dngos po med pa'am /üîΩdngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin te go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: khyab @168b par bya ba dag dngos po med pa'am / dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin te go rims bzhin no //
translated: Or, it is a proof of the designation of non-existence.

original: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdus pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù includes other types of proofs.

original: 'di ltar 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa dag tha dad de /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa dag tha dad de /
translated: Thus, here the probandum and the proof are different.

original: des na dngos po med pa dang dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa gnyi ga yang sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa dang dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa gnyi ga yang sgrub par byed do //
translated: Therefore, both the designation of non-existence and the designation of existence are established.

original: mi dmigs pa gsum pa la ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gsum pa la ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: How is the third non-apprehension?

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is stated: ‚ÄúIn the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature, etc.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
translated: The non-apprehension of intrinsic nature is the proof because the probandum and the proof are not different.

original: mi dmigs pa rtags su gyur pas dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa kho na sgrub par byed kyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa rtags su gyur pas dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa kho na sgrub par byed kyi /
translated: Since non-apprehension is the reason, it establishes only the designation of non-existence.

original: gzhan yod par grub pa'i dus kho na grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yod par grub pa'i dus kho na grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the time of establishing the existence of another is precisely the time of establishing the non-existence of this,

original: dngos po med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not non-existence.

original: 'dir klan ka tshol bar byed pas /
analyzed: 'dir klan ka tshol bar byed pas /
translated: Here, the one who seeks to find fault

original: gal te rgyu dang khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: says: ‚ÄúIf the cause and the pervader, etc.‚Äù

original: gal te gang gi tshe rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag de las gzhan pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa med pas tha snyad gdags par grub pa de'i tshe 'bras bu'am khyab par bya ba dag dngos po'am /üîΩdngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed la /
analyzed: gal te gang gi tshe rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag de las gzhan pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa med pas tha snyad gdags par grub pa de'i tshe 'bras bu'am khyab par bya ba dag dngos po'am / dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed la /
translated: If at that time, when the cause and the pervader are established to be nominally designated due to the non-existence of non-observation of the definition of the existence of something else, then at that time, the effect or the pervaded are established to be nominally designated as an existent or a non-existent.

original: gzhan yod pa'i ngo bo mi dmigs pa de yang dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa rgyu dang khyab par byed pa de gnyis kho na'i med par tha snyad gdags pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin par 'dod na go de'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i ngo bo mi dmigs pa de yang dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa rgyu dang khyab par byed pa de gnyis kho na'i med par tha snyad gdags pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin par 'dod na go de'i phyir /
translated: And that non-observation of the entity of the existence of something else is asserted to be the proof for the nominal designation of the non-existence of only those two, the cause and the pervader, which are the observed object.

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa /
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa /
translated: Therefore, the non-observation of the cause and the pervader

original: de gnyis ji ltar thams cad du me med na du ba med do //
analyzed: de gnyis ji ltar thams cad du me med na du ba med do //
translated: is like, ‚ÄúIf there is no fire, there is no smoke,‚Äù

original: shing med na sha ba med do zhes bya ba de lta bur /
analyzed: shing med na sha ba med do zhes bya ba de lta bur /
translated: and ‚ÄúIf there is no tree, there is no ≈õim≈õapƒÅ.‚Äù

original: lkog tu don la sbyor bar byed /
analyzed: lkog tu don la sbyor bar byed /
translated: It is applied to the meaning in a hidden way.

original: de las gzhan pa yod par grub pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba rgyu dang khyab par byed pas dben pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa yod par grub pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba rgyu dang khyab par byed pas dben pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The other is the opposite of that, that is, the place that is devoid of the cause and the pervader is called ‚Äúthe existence of something other than that.‚Äù

original: 'di skad du gang kho na rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag dmigs pa'i rig bya ma grub pa de kho nar sbyor bar zad kyi /
analyzed: 'di skad du gang kho na rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag dmigs pa'i rig bya ma grub pa de kho nar sbyor bar zad kyi /
translated: This is what is being said: ‚ÄúOnly that which is not established as the object of perception of the cause and the pervader is to be employed in an argument.

original: lkog tu gyur pa me tog gi grong la sogs par ni mi rung ngo zhes smras pa yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa me tog gi grong la sogs par ni mi rung ngo zhes smras pa yin te /
translated: It is not suitable to do so in a hidden object, such as a flower garden.‚Äù

original: 'di ni klan ka'o //
analyzed: 'di ni klan ka'o //
translated: This is the opponent‚Äôs objection.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The proponent of the thesis says:

original: rtags ma nges pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rtags ma nges pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Because the reason is not ascertained, it is not the case that valid knowledge itself.

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag don lkog tu gyur pa la tshad ma nyid kyis sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag don lkog tu gyur pa la tshad ma nyid kyis sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The nonperception of the cause and the pervader are not employed as valid knowledge in a hidden object.

original: ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtags ma nges pa'i phyir zhes @169a * //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtags ma nges pa'i phyir zhes @169a * //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because the reason is not ascertained.

original: 'di ltar rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo rtags ni don lkog tu gyur pa la ma nges te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo rtags ni don lkog tu gyur pa la ma nges te /
translated: Thus, the evidence that is the non-observation of a cause or a pervader is not ascertained with regard to a concealed object,

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not an observed phenomenon.

original: ma nges pa'i rtags las ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ma yin no //üîΩgal te rtags ma nges na ci'i phyir ;
analyzed: ma nges pa'i rtags las ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ma yin no // gal te rtags ma nges na ci'i phyir ;
translated: And a probandum is not established from uncertain evidence.

original: don lkog tu gyur pa la sbyor ba byed ce na /
analyzed: don lkog tu gyur pa la sbyor ba byed ce na /
translated: If the evidence is uncertain, why is an inference made with regard to a concealed object?

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa 'brel pa grub pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa 'brel pa grub pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúWhen the relation of cause and effect or the relation of pervader and pervaded is established,‚Äù and so on.

original: me dang du ba dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa grub pa yin na gang du 'ga' zhig na me med pa de na nges par du ba yang med la /
analyzed: me dang du ba dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa grub pa yin na gang du 'ga' zhig na me med pa de na nges par du ba yang med la /
translated: When fire and smoke are related by the nature of cause and effect, then wherever there is no fire, there is definitely no smoke.

original: de bzhin du shing dang sha pa dag kyang khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba grub pa yin na gang na shing med pa de na /
analyzed: de bzhin du shing dang sha pa dag kyang khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba grub pa yin na gang na shing med pa de na /
translated: Similarly, when trees and juniper are related by the nature of the relation between the pervader and the pervaded, then wherever there are no trees, there are definitely no junipers.

original: shing sha pa yang gdon mi za bar med do zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: shing sha pa yang gdon mi za bar med do zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThe asat cannot be a causal condition,‚Äù

original: 'di dag rab tu sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'di dag rab tu sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: the following is stated:

original: 'di skad du 'bras bu dang khyab par bya ba de las 'byung ba dang / de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pas 'brel pa dag //
analyzed: 'di skad du 'bras bu dang khyab par bya ba de las 'byung ba dang / de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pas 'brel pa dag //
translated: In this way, the effect and the pervader are related by the characteristic of being the same nature as that which arises from it.

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag med par ji ltar yod par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag med par ji ltar yod par 'gyur //
translated: How could the effect and the pervader exist without a cause and a pervader?

original: de'i phyir mig btsums te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig btsums te /
translated: Therefore, with eyes closed,

original: yang thams cad na rgyu dang khyab par byed pa med pa 'bras bu dang khyab par bya ba med do zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: yang thams cad na rgyu dang khyab par byed pa med pa 'bras bu dang khyab par bya ba med do zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: one should say that everywhere there is no effect and no pervader without a cause and a pervader.

original: de ltar rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gsum char yang bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gsum char yang bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having presented the three types of reasons called nature, effect, and non-apprehension,

original: mdo'i don dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mdo'i don dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to connect this with the meaning of the s≈´tra,üîΩit is said:

original: de lta bas na phyogs kyi chos 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na phyogs kyi chos 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThis property of the subject, etc.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs gsum la phyogs kyi chos rnam pa gsum bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gsum la phyogs kyi chos rnam pa gsum bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The three types of property of the subject that were explained in the context of the three types of reason are just the forward pervasion and the counter pervasion.

original: de'i phyir de'i chad khyab pa tshul gsum pa'i phyogs kyi chos rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i chad khyab pa tshul gsum pa'i phyogs kyi chos rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs ni /
translated: Therefore, the reason that has the three modes, the property of the subject, which is endowed with the forward pervasion and the counter pervasion,

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum kho na shes par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum kho na shes par byed pa yin no //
translated: is just the prover that has three types: nature, effect, and non-apprehension.

original: ci'i phyir rnam pa gsum kho na zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam pa gsum kho na zhe na /
translated: Why are there just three types?

original: de'i phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba chos la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro hes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba chos la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro hes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúBecause it is infallible with regard to its own probandum, the property.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'khrul pa med kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'khrul pa med kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: In this way, just these three types of reason are infallible with regard to their own probandum, the property, but others are not.

original: 'di ltar de las 'byung ba dad de'i bdag nyid kyi @169b mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa 'di kho na la yod kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de las 'byung ba dad de'i bdag nyid kyi @169b mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa 'di kho na la yod kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the relation exists in this very way, by the nature of the property of the reason, but not in any other way.

original: mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skabs rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter on the reason of non-apprehension is completed.

original: // / de ltar mtshan nyid gsum pa gtan tshigs nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar mtshan nyid gsum pa gtan tshigs nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the three characteristics as the reason,

original: log par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: log par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to remove false conceptions,

original: gzhan nyid dag ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes zer te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan nyid dag ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes zer te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, Others say that the reason has six characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid gsum pa la rangs par ma gyur pa kha cig ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug par 'chad do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gsum pa la rangs par ma gyur pa kha cig ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug par 'chad do //
translated: Some, not satisfied with the three characteristics, explain the reason as having six characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid drug po bgrang bar bya ba'i phyir /üîΩgsum po de dag ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid drug po bgrang bar bya ba'i phyir / gsum po de dag ces bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to enumerate the six characteristics,üîΩhe says, Those three.

original: sngar bshad pa dag go /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa dag go /
translated: They are the ones explained earlier.

original: gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The subject is not contradicted means

original: gtan tshigs gang la gnod par ma byas pa'i yul yod pa de ni gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gang la gnod par ma byas pa'i yul yod pa de ni gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can no //
translated: The subject that has an object that is not contradicted by a reason is the subject that is not contradicted.

original: de'i ngo bo ni gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid de /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid de /
translated: Its nature is the state of being the subject that is not contradicted.

original: tshad ma dag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul ma btsal ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshad ma dag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul ma btsal ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the object that is the property to be established by the valid means of knowledge is not sought.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The meaning is that it is the one that is intended to be expressed as the number one.

original: rdzas gang la grangs gcig yod pa de ni grangs gcig pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas gang la grangs gcig yod pa de ni grangs gcig pa'o //
translated: The substance that has the number one is the one that is the number one.

original: spyi gang la rten nyid du rdzas brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig par brjod par 'dod pa can no //
analyzed: spyi gang la rten nyid du rdzas brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig par brjod par 'dod pa can no //
translated: The universal that is the basis of the expression of the substance is the one that is intended to be expressed as the number one.

original: de'i ngo bo ni de nyid de grangs gcig dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs bsal ba la gtan tshigs nyid ces bya ba spyi rten pa de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'di la blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni de nyid de grangs gcig dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs bsal ba la gtan tshigs nyid ces bya ba spyi rten pa de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'di la blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Its nature is just that. The reason that possesses the number one is the reason that is the basis of the universal reason. This is the definition of the reason. It should be seen in this way. This is the meaning.

original: shes pa nyid ces bya ba la /
